column4: yeah, what's the difference in apt-get install and apt-get upgrade?
- the first installs one or more programs that you specify. the second offers to upgrade all packages that have updates
upgrade upgrades all packages that have updates...so what's the difference in upgrade and dist-upgrade?  because i thought that was what dist-upgrade did?
- dist-upgrade upgrades you from one version of the OS to the next. breezy -> dapper for the last release
